metadata.name: Remote Access Tool - RURAT Execution From Unusual Location
metadata.comment: Detects execution of Remote Utilities RAT (RURAT) from an unusual location (outside of 'C:\Program Files')

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rutserv.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rfusclient.exe'))) AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('remote utilities') AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\remote utilities')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\remote utilities'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of Remote Utilities RAT (RURAT) from an unusual location (outside of 'C:\Program Files')
